Content:
********

==================================================================================
Pink Floyd - Dark Side Of The Moon (Japan Harvest 1984 CD)
==================================================================================

01:   Dark Side Of The Moon         |  FLAC 44,1 kHz, 16 bit
02:   Dark side of The Moon         |  Lame 3.98 MP3 44,1 kHz, 16 bit;
                                       "-V4", about 160 kbps, Joint Stereo



This is widely believed to be the best digital 2-channel transfer of this 
album yet.


Note: The wave file was de-emphasised (using "Sox"), then normalized
(to -1 db, using audition 3), then cut by using the cue (with EAC). Afterwards 
I encoded the wave-files to flac. The portable mp3 version was created from the 
flac files.


Original Wave and Cue were taken from this torrent: 
w_w.demonoid.c_m/files/details/565319/?show_files=&page=4


I've also created a flac rip of the unofficial DVD-Audio 4.1 version of this album.
It can be obtained here:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4942314/Pink_Floyd_-_Dark_Side_Of_The_Moon_%5BFLAC_5.1_Multichannel%5D


I strongly encourage anyone to buy the original album on CD / SACD / vinyl!


Enjoy this torrent

- emandoz
